attributes.action: Disband the government and the House for failing us, hold new general elections!
attributes.additional_details:
After circumventing the normal parliamentary process by a public vote on Brexit, the Government has failed to deliver a solution for a dangerous situation for more than 2 years, causing national and international distrust and instability, the disruption of and an imminent threat of a long-term ruin to the economy and to the international reputation of the UK.
The members of the House of Commons of all political sides have failed us by neglecting their duty to represent and protect our interests.
attributes.background:
The Government of the United Kingdom lead by Theresa May has failed the People to govern in accordance with their will and ruined Great Britain's international political reputation to the level of a beggar.
The members of the House of Commons assisted by applying utter negligance until the very end

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's very similar to petitions we already have open. 
 
You might like to sign and share one or more of these petitions. 

Have another general election  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480

Hold a General Election in April 2019.  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235071

If Theresa May resigns as Prime Minister a general election must be held.  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/252449
